choices: You put it on your dresser, there is no need to rush
1.content:
You are walking around your house one Friday afternoon, when you see a crumpled up piece of paper in your basement. Out of curiosity, you pick it up to see an Old coin inside with a piece of thread and beads strewn through the hole in its center. You thought it kinda looked like a old Ryo coin piece from Japan but you weren't too sure. Looking at the piece of paper you see writing on it, "Coin of Dreams: Your wishes become the dreams of others!" it read like some sorta pitch you would hear from a con artist in TV shows. After that read instructions, "Wish for something on someone and their dreams that night will make them want to do your wish ever so slightly (repeat use for stronger effect). Just think of their name and face and make a wish! (Warning: Coin fancies himself an artist and will interpret the dream accordingly).

"This is so stupid", you thought to yourself but a part of you was kind of intrigued by the idea. You took the coin and decided to test it. What's the worst that could happen, am I right?

You decided to test it on...
1.title: The Beginning

choices: One of your sisters, Danna or Michele
This is Stupid! You use it on yourself without realizing it
11.content:
If you are going to test is out then someone in your family should be the target first since they will be easy to monitor, although dad might be tricky since he is out of the house most of the time.

You decide to test it on...
11.title: A Family member

113.content: Which one will it be?
113.title: One of your sisters, Danna or Michele

choices: "I was someone stupid enough to believe in this crap"
115.content:
You felt embarrassed for even entertaining the idea that this thing was legit, it was probably just a prank from Michele or Danna anyway.

"Man, am I stupid or what?" You remark in half sarcastic manner, looking at the coin in a coy manner, you remark, "God, I wish..."
115.title: "Magic isn't real!"

choices: Lauren will gain your Chemistry knowledge...and you'll gain hers in exchange!
Lauren will gain a copy of your Chemistry knowledge
1151.content:
"Maybe I should give this to Lauren. She's stupid enough to believe in this sort of thing." Lauren is your lab partner in Chemistry class, and she is, quite frankly, insufferable. She's possibly the dumbest girl you've ever met, and it shows whenever you interact with her. She never listens in class, and always tries to copy your notes after lectures. Labs with her are the worst. Even if you slowly explain the procedures to her, she forgets them completely half the time, so you end up doing most of the work by yourself. Lauren's only saving grace is that she's attractive. If she weren't, no one would be able to put up with her. She has platinum blonde hair, a nice tan, C cup breasts, and a slim figure. All in all, she's a classic ditz, good to look at but a nightmare to deal with in class.

You turn your attention to the coin, and then you get an idea. With a wry smile, you say, "If this coin is real, then I wish that I could give Lauren my knowledge, so that she'll be a little less annoying." You then put the coin in a drawer in your nightstand.

That night, you and Lauren both have a strange dream. As a consequence of these dreams...
1151.title: "I was someone stupid enough to believe in ...

11511.content:
Lauren was in Chemistry class, she hated it, but somehow, today she was totally enjoying it. The blackboard was full of formulas, but they were so easy to understand, and she could totally hear everyone saying she was like sooooo smart. She giggled, that was totally the best class in her whole life. Someone was at her side, she really knew his name, but it was so difficult to remember, if he weren't so foggy and stuff she would totally remember. That person was looking at the blackboard, then at the things on the table, then to the blackboard again. Lauren giggled, that shadow was so dummy. She would help that shadow, after all she was the most smartest girl in the whole class. She explained him what to do, but he was so dummy, he forgot everything right after she told him, so she had to totally do everything by herself.

In her bed, Lauren smiled, she was having a happy dream.


You had the opposite dream. You usually knew what to do, but today you hadn't understood anything, you were getting nervous, if you couldn't do anything, you would certainly fail. Suddenly, someone at your side spoke to you, that person was like a shadow, you couldn't realize who she was, neither you could understand what she was saying. The shadow took the... things on the table, you couldn't remember their names or what to do with them, and expertly used them. You realized she was doing the exercises. You were safe, everything was alright now. So you just stayed there, thanking the shadow with a radiant smile, trying to look as adorable as you could, somehow you knew that could work when you were in trouble.

In your bed, you smiled, you were having a happy dream... maybe?


You woke up refreshed, as is you didn't care about something anymore. You couldn't point what it was, but you knew it was good to feel this way.
Your good mood disappeared in Chemistry class, you couldn't understand anything, fortunately and surprisingly, Lauren knew what to do, she even tried to teach you, but today wasn't your day, you couldn't understand something so simple that even Lauren understood without problem. So you just looked while she worked, the only thing you could do was smile at her.

While you were heading for your next class, everyone was talking about Lauren and how well she did in Chemistry, not the best topic for you. Fortunately, next class was Maths, and you understood everything without problem. From your desk, you could see Lauren, not paying attention and staring at the boys in class. That ditz was surely only thinking about one thing. Her Chemistry's skills were only luck.

You were to bed still mad at Lauren and her suddenly knowledge. Without realizing, you took the coin in your hand and said "Wish you were good at Maths too, right?" just before felling slept.
11511.title: Lauren will gain your Chemistry knowledge...and...

choices: He gains a new interest in something he originally does not like to do
He gains an interest from his sisters
He gains an interest from someone else
1152.content:
There is only reason you would believe that this was real you were bored, like supremely bored! You had whole bunch of video games but, like many gamers before you, you just couldn't find a game that you wanted to play at the moment. You wrapped the coin in the piece of paper and placed on a dusty cardboard box as you head back upstairs. When you reach the first floor, you see your sisters hanging out, doing each others nails as they watch My little pony together. Annoyed that they got to the TV before you head to the kitchen to continue your day.

The wish that Bernie unintentionally made is going to affect his interests but from what perspective?
1152.title: "Bored as fu-"

choices: Or maybe he loses interest in something he likes
11521.content:
After grabbing the bag of chips that you and Ian keep in the pantry you head to your room to try and start a new Skyrim playthrough. Your room was to put it bluntly, really filthy. There was clothes, books, games and other items strewn about the floor to the point that you only saw patches of the floor. Your desk and bookcase was disorganized as all hell and covered in dust and your trash can was overflowing with snack bags and scraps of paper.

You made your way to the right most corner of the room which was your own little game space. While you did take care of your games, they were still very disorganized and spread out in a sporadic manner. After you set everything up and started the intro sequence, Ian walked into your room, tip toeing through the mess to sit next to you and watch you as he played his 3DS. After about a couple hours, you had finally decided what your character would look like a brown haired Imperial woman and finally got the playable portion of the game. You stopped playing by the time you got out of the tutorial zone. You began to get ready for bed.

That night, Bernie had a dream that affected his interest in...
11521.title: New Interest Incoming

115211.content:
You had a dream that you were watching your room you could not move or look away from your room but, as you look at your filthy room, you feel sick. Your body feels terrible looking at your room, when suddenly a figure enters your room and begins to clean it. You can't make anything out about this person, not their face or gender but as they clean the room you begin to feel happier. The more they clean the happier you feel, a tranquility that turns into joy and bliss as the finishing touches are done to the room. As you try to thank the figure, the dream ends.
....
You wake up both happy and stressed out, your room was filthy, you could not believe you let it get this out of hand but, something in the back of your head felt very motivated to clean it, almost excited. You went downstairs to get a quick breakfast before getting dressed and getting to work. You started picking up all the clothes and trash from the floor and began to put them into the hamper and trash bag respectively. Over the course of the rest of the day, you began to clean the room, making some mistakes that made the room dirtier but, you were actually enjoying cleaning your room for some reason. By late afternoon, your room looked a lot cleaner though your own clothes had become filthy in the process. You were surprised by how much fun you had when you were cleaning, why did you not enjoy it before?

Just then some one entered the room with the coin in their hand, but who?
115211.title: Cleaning

1152111.content:
Your mom had gone down into the basement to search through her old boxed up knick-knacks when she has spotted the coin on the dusty card board box. She paid no mind to what the paper said and only looked at the coin, "Oh, this looks nice. Put a chain through it and it will make a nice, simple necklace." she thought to herself. It was then that she noticed the ruckus coming from your room. She rarely ever heard you make this much except from when you would turn your TV too loud when you would play games. As she had opened the door, she was surprised. She could actually see the floor! Your mom had been trying to get you to clean your room for while now and while there was still plenty of room for improvement that fact that you had actually took the initiative to clean was practically a time to celebrate for her. "Wow, Bernie! Your room almost looks livable. I'm so happy!" Her surprise was clear as her voice had gone up an octave with that remark.

"Yeah, I just felt like cleaning and I ended up kinda enjoying it. You know, it was just sorta relaxing to get this outta the way."

"Well, that is great! But, I would have probably appreciated you not putting the mess on your clothes." She jokingly remarked as she pointed to your now filthy clothes.

"Yeah, and not only these but, I found a lot of my dirty on the floor or beneath some leftover chip bags. Looks like I got a little lazy once my hamper was full." You estimated that all the dirty clothes made up about eighty percent of your entire wardrobe.

Your mom could only gave you smile with 'I told you so' written all over her face. "Well, I wish that...
1152111.title: Your Mom

11521112.content:
"Well, I wish you got some nicer clothes. No offense, but they weren't much to look at when they were clean." Your mom had always been frank to a fault. It was annoying from time to time but, for the most part, you would say that was something you admired about her. She was always quick stand up to anyone she thought was wrong or needlessly mean.

You sarcastically reply that you will get on that later, as you collapse on your bean bag chair since you spent all day cleaning and you were exhausted. You decided to take your mind of the exhaustion with some more gaming. Your siblings each took turns to check your room after hearing from your mom.

Danna seemed happy and expressed hope that you would play dress up with her sometime now that your room is cleaner. Liam was also pleased as it made chilling next to you less of a chore. Michele was surprised and jokingly suggested you work on her room.
.....
You have a dream that compels you to consider wearing what?
11521112.title: You got some nicer clothes

115211122.content:
That night you had another dream. Once again you stood in your room. It was messy again. It was disgusting to look at. You felt compelled to clean it. You begun doing so. After a short while you saw that your clothes were messy. Once again you were disgusted, even more than before. You almost screamed. You quickly stripped and started to look for something to wear. All clothes were dirty and messy. Then you saw a rack with what clearly was a maid's dress. It had white apron attached to it and puffy short sleeves. You immediately grabbed it and put it on. It was perfect. You never felt so calm. It filled with you happiness. You came back to cleaning with wide smile on your face.

...

You woke up feeling calm and happy. You were looking forward to next day. You got up and right away begun cleaning your room. There wasn't much to clean. You finished pretty fast and then grabbed some clothes to wear. You put on your usual outfit but it felt strangely uncomfortable. You decided to brush it off and went on to grab something to eat. Over the day the feeling of discomfort was growing. It grew to a point you couldn't bare it any longer. You felt compelled to change it. You were putting on different sets of your clothes but each outfit gave you the same feeling. Suddenly a thought popped up in your mind. You remembered that your mum had a maid outfit for doing chores. You didn't see her wear it even once and you felt that it could help.
115211122.title: Maid/housekeeping clothes

11522.content: What interest does he gain?
11522.title: He gains an interest from his sisters

choices: Surely you know more people than this
12.content:
You consider that it maybe better to not go for your family just in case it works since your family may notice the changes to the others behavior quickly. It would be fun to involve a friend in your tests.

Drake would be one of the best test subjects since he wouldn't stress out too much about it even if you tell him about it. Shannon would be nice since you could get to know her better but, you also consider against it since you don't really want to change her but, maybe you could use it on Cassidy and become friends with her to get close to Shannon. Ms. Monroe would be interesting just for the fact that she is older and has to interact with a bunch of people. Or you could try someone else.

After some deliberation, you decide on...
12.title: A friend or aquaintance

choices: Tell her a secret, and become one of Cassidy's friends
123.content:
You decide to not use it on Shannon and instead use it on Cassidy. She lives close by and if you make her your friend you can find out what Shannon likes and show her you are friends with her best friend. "I wish Cassidy wanted to be my friend" you said into the coin and then you retired to your bed waiting to see what would happen.
...
That night Cassidy had a dream she was playing with her pets except all or her pets had Bernie's face. She frolicked and walked with them played ball with them and just sat around as she talked about her day to her Bernie-faced pets until she woke up.
...
Cassidy woke up that morning feeling refreshed it was serene yet very surreal dream and she found herself with the sudden inclination to hang out with Bernie, perhaps that dream was her subconscious telling her what she wanted to do. She decided to hang out with him after did her daily routine.

You had woken up at 9 in the morning since it was a Saturday almost completely forgetting about the wish yesterday, almost. You hung around the house getting dressed, eating breakfast watching TV until about 11 when some came knocking at you door. You answered the to see Cassidy.

"Hey Bernie, like hows it been?" she asked.

I have been pretty good. Did you want to hang out or something?" You asked trying to test the waters.

"Like OMG, how did you know?" She asked curiously.

"Lucky guess." you lied. "So what do you want to do?"

"Well if we are like going to hang out, we totes have to go to the mall", she said giddily, "I want to check out some of the cute new clothes that came out and we can get something yummy to eat."

You supposed that she just wanted to do what she would with her other friends, you weren't really interested in shopping but you had to get Shannon through her. "That sounds great, let's go."

"Like, totally!"

You then spent the rest of the day being dragged around by Cassidy. She bought a bunch of new which were in her words 'the most cutest clothes in, like, the whole world' and went to a healthy food restaurant, you complained but, Cassidy blew you off and ordered some salads for the both of you. It was exhausting but, you felt like you were getting closer Cassidy, one final push and you could get her on your side to help you with Shannon.

"Like, I had a lotta fun, we should totes do this again!" Cassidy said as you got back to her house.

"Yeah, sure. See ya later, Cassidy." You said with a little reluctance in your voice.

"Buh-bye, Bernie!" Cassidy giggled as she went into her house.

Once you got back to your house it was already night time exhausted you took out the coin, "I wish Cassidy was my best friend", was all you could muster before passing out again.
...
Cassidy once again had another dream except this it her life for an entire year, she had gone through some great times and some horrible times but, at the end of each day she would to her room talk to her rock friend which was in the shape of Bernie's head. She talked about her troubles, her secrets and her joys to the rock at it made her feel better. The rock was truly her best friend until she woke up.
...
Cassidy once again to your house this time around 1 in the afternoon were she let herself and decided to talk to you.

"Like, it is so nice to just talk with a friend, ya know? So let's totes make this official and each of us tell each other a secret. I'll start, now like don't tell anyone but I used to do ballet until I was seven, I mean like can even imagine?" She said with a giggle. "Now its your turn."
123.title: Cassidy

choices: Romance movies, books and tv shows
1232.content:
This is what you were hoping would happen. Now you could get her on your side, but first... a secret.
You debated with what you wanted to tell her before you mustered up the courage and reluctantly told her. "I used to wet the bed until the third grade" you became beet red just saying it to Cassidy of all people but you needed her trust.

"What? No way! That's so funny" Cassidy just giggled to herself in delight. "You do trust me, this is great. We are totes friends now!"

"Yeah, its great. Uh, can you excuse me for sec, I got to go to the bathroom." She had caught you of guard but really did have to go to the bathroom and you had been holding it in for a while.

"Oh, okay. I'll just turn on the TV for a bit", and with a nod you ran to the bathroom, sucks the only working one was on the second floor. Just then, Cassidy noticed you left the coin on the table. "Ooh, I saw Bernie playing with this when we were shopping yesterday, could this be a lucky charm? I didn't know he liked this sorta thing too. Ooh, I wish we shared more of the same interests." Cassisdy put the coin down before you came back, unaware that she had made wish and neither did you.

That night you decided against making a wish and wait and see what you could get of her in the next couple of days.

When you went to bed, you had a dream that influenced your feelings on...
1232.title: Now one of Cassidy's friends...

choices: For you to confide to Cassidy
For you to see her as Big Sister
12321.content:
That night Bernie had a dream that he was spending time with Cassidy except she was a giant. She delicately held you by your hands as she guided you forward as you looked down you noticed that you were wearing some pink stilettos but, you found them cute on your feet and liked wearing them as you began to enjoy walking in them more and more Cassidy slowly shrunk down until she was normal size and as the two of you looked at each other and turned around you found yourself at a shoe store.
...
You woke that morning with a smile on your face. You could not remember any of the details but you did remember that you wanted to hang out with Cassidy again today and hopefully learn something useful about Shannon. It was about 10:30 in the morning as you got to Cassidy's house. When she opened the door, her face lit up.

"Hey Bernie!" She was already dressed as well, having already finished her morning run and shower.

"Hey Cass, I was wondering if you wanted to hang out today?"

"Of Course! Actually I wanted to go shopping at the mall again."

"Shopping again already?"

"Of course, I wanted to try on some shoes and..."

"Shoes?" You did not know why but trying on shoes with Cassidy sounded fun and she could tell.

"Yeah, you want to try some on too?" Her curiousity was peaked as well as ecstatic that you both wanted to go shoe shopping.

"I mean, sure, I guess." You wondered why you try on some shoes with Cassidy but quickly put in the back of your brain.

"Awesome! Just let me get my purse. And then we'll go." Cassidy could tell it was going to be a fun day.

The drive was quick and navigating the mall to the shoe store was quicker with Cassidy leading the way, as if she was laser targeted to the destination. You felt nervous going in and straight to the women's section with all the heels so you were playing with the coin in one hand as a form of stress relief. As Cassidy was looking at all the shoes you began to look around before a pair of shoes caught your eye. They were a pair of pink pumps with a slight platform a tall heel with a small strap with a cute pink bow affixed to the outer side of the heel. You couldn't take your eyes off it and eventually Cassidy noticed.

"Hey Bernie, you have good taste, do you want to try them on?" Cassidy was completely serious and ecstatic to see your interest in the shoes.

"What? N-no, no I..." You were extremely embarrassed with your face turning the deepest shade of red.

Cassidy took you by the shoulders and faced with a dead serious face, "Bernie, I didn't ask you to make fun of you but, because I can tell that you were interested in them, in my opinion I think they are perfect for you. So do you want try them on."

You were touched by Cassidy's frankness and calmed down a little as you squeaked out a 'yes'. Cassidy then proceeded to down a pair of the pumps (making sure they would fit you) and handed the box to you. You were still pretty embarrassed but could deny the interest in the shoes. You sat down and put the coin down next to you without really thinking about it. You took off your shoes and socks and then proceeded to put the pumps on slowly. You had never worn anything like this before but once you put them on a small smile came across your face looking at how cute they looked on your feet as you felt a conflicting feeling of confusion, embarrassment and Joy from wearing them.

Meanwhile, Cassidy was sitting next to you the whole time, who had absentmindedly picked up the coin as she looked at how happy you were wearing the shoes. She was so focused on this moment for you she had made another wish on you without even realizing it. The wish being...
12321.title: Women's footwear

123211.content:
Cassidy knew that you wouldn't just openly demonstrate your interest in heels with just and she could tell from the look on your face that you liked wearing the shoes so she hoped that you would trust her and ask for help if you needed it. Afterwards, Cassidy tried to convince you to make poses so she could pictures even pinky promising that she would not show a soul. You could not refuse the pinky promise but, you did not pose for her. She then proceeded to buy the shoes for you and even some white nylons just in case you wanted something with the pumps and a pair of black stillettos for herself. When you got home you could not believe you gotten such a girly pair of foot wear but none the less you had. The days events were so intense for you that immediately went to bed.
...
You had a dream were you had diary that you wrote all your secrets in as you close the diary the name 'Cassidy' was displayed in giant pink and purple cursive handwriting. You felt you could write anything in there safely, free from the judgement of the boys and girls around you.
...
You wake up from the dream much more relaxed than the day before but you needed to see Cassidy as soon as possible you even decided not to bring the coin and decided to bring the pumps and nylons with you as you wanted to talk about them. You had quickly showered and got dressed before looking at the clock it was already 10:30 man had you slept in and hurried to Cassidy's house.

Cassidy answered the door like last in her usual chipper tone but, could tell by your face something was up. You sat down at her couch so you could talk.

"Cassidy, I don't know what's going on. I feel so conflicted about it."

"About what, Bernie?" She could already tell what he meant but asked anyway.

"About the shoes, I feel like I shouldn't like them but, but..." You couldn't find the words. You were too confused.

"Bernie, it's ok", Cassidy had a soft and soothing voice, "It is totally normal to like them, they are adorable and they look good on you."

"But I am not supposed to like them. I am a guy!" You were getting frustrated.

"So what? If you like them, then you like them. Being a guy doesn't make it a bad thing. If you want to do it then you should do it."

Does she manage to convince Bernie?
123211.title: For you to confide to Cassidy

choices: Nothing happens and Bernie just goes home
1232111.content:
Cassidy's impassioned speech made him feel assured and happy, he was glad he had this talk with Cassidy. Bernie asked if she could help him get used to walking in them, which she happily agreed to. For the rest of the day Cassidy trained Bernie in how to walk in the pumps: from standing to walking, to going up and down stairs and even convinced him to make poses for her take pictures then came something he did not expect.

"Cooking in them?" Bernie was confused as to why.

"Yes, it will be a good experience for you plus it is always good to learn how to cook."

Cassidy them began her training's second phase: doing tasks while standing in heels and cooking training. She became almost spartan like in how much she worked Bernie to make sure he could move in heels effortlessly. By the end, his feet were killing and he was completely exhausted but, he had pretty much moving around in the heels.
1232111.title: Embracing it

12321111.content: While you were confiding in Cassidy and doing her training, someone used the coin but who?
12321111.title: Meanwhile, someone uses the coin

123211112.content:
Danna had found the coin and the instructions on how to use it. She was not sure it would work but she saw you fiddling with it and she decided she would take it just to mess with you. Even more of a skeptic than you she only snorted at the concept of magic in the real world.

"Can't believe Bern was fooled by this. I wish that Bernie would ___________" she said in a sarcastic tone.

What was her wish?
123211112.title: Danna

choices: You Call Cassidy to Hang Out
123212.content:
Cassidy was thrilled with how happy the shoes were making you. She was an only child, but she'd always wanted to do cool older sister stuff like teaching about fashion, makeup, and relationships.

"I wish Bernie would look up to me like that, like I was his Big sister." she said to herself.

Cassidy bought the shoes for you and even a couple pairs of white nylons to go with. Soon you were back home, wondering why you had chosen such girly shoes. The rest of the day passed uneventfully, and you were soon fast asleep.

...

You were in your room, and it was dark for some reason. Looking around for the lightswitch, you noticed your new shoes sitting in front of you closet.

"What are those doing there, I put them in the closet so no one would see them." you say nervously.

You suddenly feel like you can't move, or look away. You're just staring at the shoes as a strange mixture of emotions consumes you. You feel embarrassed about about getting girly shoes, but you also feel happy about them, but you're afraid someone will find them and make fun of you for it. You just feel so confused, and you wish someone would come help you.

You then notice Cassidy enter the room, though she looks different. She looks like Michelle did at 16, with long wavy brown hair and your families gray-blue eyes. But Cassidy seems warmer than Michelle, more friendly. You never felt like you could talk to or just hang out with Michelle and be friends, but Cassidy gives that aura. She walks over to you and hugs you close, and you immediately feel at ease as your previous confusion and apprehension just vanished without a trace. A smile came to your face as Cassidy sat you down on the bed and started talking to you about shoes and style and women's footwear. You didn't really notice what she was saying, but it didn't matter. It felt like you finally had a big sister you could look up to.

...

You woke at about 9:14, feeling very refreshed and energized. You didn't really remember your dreams from last night, but you knew they were pleasant. And now you were looking forward to another day hanging out with your new friend Cassidy. No, she was more than a friend. You realized she was more like an older sister to you than just another friend.
123212.title: Big Sister Cassidy

choices: You Use the Coin that Evening
Cassidy Made Another Wish while You were Shopping
1232121.content:
Pretty much the first thing you do after waking up is give Cassidy a call, you can't wait to hang out with her today.

"Hey Bernie! How're you doing?" she says as she answers the phone.

"I'm doing great. I was hoping we could do something today." you say.

"That sounds great! I haven't yet shown you everything the mall has to offer. Come on over after you eat breakfast and we can go over!" she says energetically.

"Cool, I'll be over soon!" you say as you hang up.

You're extremely eager to learn all about hanging out at the mall from Cassidy, so you eat breakfast fast and soon you two are on your way to the mall.

"Thanks for showing me around the mall today sis." you say.

"Sis?" Cassidy asks, surprised but also hoping she heard right.

"Yeah, these last few days you've honestly felt like you're my big sister. Is that weird?" you ask.

"Not at all, I've always wanted to be someone's big sister!" Cassidy replies, thrilled to be able to finally have a student to teach in the ways of teenage girl.

The day is a blur, but you enjoy every second of it. First Cassidy takes you back to the massive clothing store you visited yesterday. You spent hours in there trying out different outfits. Initially you were hesitant to try on any more girl's clothes, and you never really got past shoes. But you really did hang on every word Cassidy said, learning everything she knew about fashion and putting outfits together. Eventually you went to eat lunch at the mall food court. You were planning on getting something from the pizza place, but Cassidy suggested that you both eat at the low-calorie deli. Cassidy always watched her figure, and while you wouldn't normally go to the deli you just felt that her advice was inherently trustworthy. After lunch the two of you visit Cassidy's favorite salon. You didn't figure much would happen here since Cassidy was only setting up an appointment for tomorrow, but she suggested that you both get appointments at the same time and once again you found yourself following her suggestion and you agreed to an afternoon appointment at the salon.

Eventually you both went to your respective homes, and you quietly carried two bags up to your room. Cassidy had insisted on buying you more shoes, one pair of knee-high boots and one pair of sandals. You didn't mind the girls shoes, Cassidy recommended them after all.

Eventually the day came to a close, and you were happy to have spent it with your "big sister" Cassidy.
1232121.title: You Call Cassidy to Hang Out

choices: She Wished for Bernie to Have a Girly Personality like Her
12321212.content:
You had left the coin out on the table during lunch, and Cassidy noticed it when you briefly went to the restroom.

"Bernie had this yesterday too, some sort of good luck charm I guess." she said. "Well, my wish for him to see me as his big sister seemed to come true, let's try again."

What did she wish for.
12321212.title: Cassidy Made Another Wish while You were Shopping

choices: Cassidy Decides to Stop Somewhere First
123212121.content:
"I wish Bernie was more girly, I know he likes doing this stuff and it'd be nice if he were even more keen on it." Cassidy said.

Later that night, you went to bed without using the coin. You were fairly tired after the day's activities, and you were soon asleep.

...

The clothing store at the mall was great. No, great didn't even begin to cover it. It was amazing. It had so many clothes in so many styles, everything a girl like you could want.

Wait, girl? For some reason, that seems wrong to you. But no, you're fairly sure you're a girl. After all, you don't act like a boy at all. You love shopping, especially for clothes. Your big sister Cassidy always shows you more clothes in the store just when you're sure you've seen them all. Feminine styles are your favorite, and you could spend years just trying out different outfits. Eventually Cassidy takes you to the salon for a beauty day, and you love it there too. You keep going from place to place, from store to store, all while Cassidy shows you the way. This is the life for a girly girl like you.

...

You sleep in later than usual and when you wake up you feel a surge of energy. You've never felt this energized, and you feel like you could shop all day! You're started from your excitement when you see a text from Cassidy.

"Hey! We should totally hang out at the mall before our salon appointment."

Of course, you'd almost forgotten about the appointment. You didn't now how, you were looking forward to it so much.

"Yeah we should! I'll get dressed and be right over." you respond.

You decide to wear one of your new girly shoes today. You slip the white nylons on and decide to wear the boots. You were going to just wear them normally but for some reason you decided to tuck them under your pant legs. They still looked feminine, but for some reason you were hesitant to wear them openly. You eat a quick bite of breakfast and meet Cassidy at her door.

"Oh you're wearing your new boots, I knew they'd look super cute on you!" she says.

"Thanks for buying them for me, you really are a master of fashion." you say.
123212121.title: Girly Bernie

choices: Grab a quick bite to eat
1232121211.content:
You and Cassidy arrive at the mall once again and like last time, the two of you head to the massive clothing section. This time, however, you were looking forward trying on some clothes this time. "Hey Cassidy, can you help me try on some clothes?" You request innocently.

"Of course!" she says as she takes you by the hand and eagerly whisks you away with her to collect a variety of clothes. She started with clothes that went well with your boots, so she selected a couple of form fitting jeans and picked numerous blouses and tank tops. She shoved you into the changing room and said, "Okay, Try these on. See what you like, get a feel for how to combo your outfit and when you've tried on everything, pick the one you like best. I'm going to get something real quick!" After she finished she happily skipped off.

The outfits were easy enough to put on, you liked the form fitting cuts of the clothes and you tended to lean more heavily toward the blouses than the tank tops. After a while of trying out the combinations, you settled on a pair of light blue jeans and a lavender blouse. As you you left the changing stall to see if Cassidy had returned, you found her standing in front of you stall with another pile of clothes and a shoe box.

"Surprise!" she squealed as she presented the shoe box to you, it was was a pair of black mary janes in your size. "I got you these. I figured they would make it easier to try some more clothes. You happily accepted as you presented your new ensemble to her. "Hey, you look great! So what did you settle one?" You showed her your selection and the two of sorted them into the 'buy' and 'not buy' piles and then you moved on to the next pile of clothes, which heavily features dresses, skirt, shorts and lingerie. You were delighted Cassidy had brought you so much to try on. Of course, when trying these on you had to ask Cassidy to help you put them on. This sort of bonding only strengthened your perception of Cassidy as Big sister, as you became more and more attached.

Eventually, the two of you were at check out, buying a huge selection of clothes for yourself. Next, you....
1232121211.title: You Arrive at the Mall

choices: You Make a Wish with the Coin
12321212111.content:
You didn't really know why you had felt so apprehensive about the salon yesterday. You vaguely recalled concerns about it being to girly, but now you realize that that's exactly why you were looking forward to it. You had no idea that such girly and feminine activities as shopping and beauty appointments were so much fun!

"Hey Liza!" Cassidy greeted the stylist. "I'll have my usual, and give my friend here the works."

You decided to let Cassidy arrange your styling, she knew everything about this sort of thing. Liza raised an eyebrow to Cassidy and the two quickly whispered to each other. You didn't really pay that much attention, you were too excited to get started.

After dropping off your clothing purchases in the salon's lockers, Liza led you over to a sink where she began washing your hair. You'd had your hair cut before of course, but never had it felt this nice. Liza's scrubbing and massaging of your scalp made you feel slightly out of it, and you barely noticed as you were led over to one of the main chairs. You could here Liza and Cassidy discussing something as Liza spread something into your hair. You caught a few words here and there like "stimulates growth" and "female customers" but you didn't worry about it too much. Big sister Cassidy was taking care of things. Liza added some other product on your hair which smelled like citrus and made your hair feel much more bouncy and voluminous, even at its short length.

Liza then took you over to the nail station and gave you a manicure. Your nails were short and rather rough, and most of the procedure was Liza filling them into nice, soft curves. You remember Liza suggesting you grow them out and you really weren't sure why you weren't already doing that. The though of long, beautiful nails was so appealing, you committed then and there to letting your nails grow long.

Your appointment didn't last long since Liza could only do so much with your short hair and nails. Cassidy said she wanted to bring you back in a couple days after they'd had a chance to grow and you eagerly accepted. Cassidy then showed you a selection of different lotions, moisturizers, and exfoliating gels available at this small skin-care store the mall had. She purchased a few items for you and instructed you on their use.

You both went home after that, since the mall closed early that day. Unfortunately you had school tomorrow as well so you couldn't just hang out at the mall all day. Despite that, you really enjoyed yourself today. Before turning in for the night, you remembered the coin and that you hadn't used it in a few days.
12321212111.title: Head to your salon appointments

choices: You Wish that Shannon will Join You and Cassidy on Your Next Mall Outing
123212121111.content:
You finally make another wish with the coin, so what did you do with it?

(Note that, since no further wish has been made on you, you will still be affected by Cassidy's last wish to make you more girly.)
123212121111.title: You Make a Wish with the Coin

1232121211111.content:
Looking down at the coin, you realize that you hadn't really been making progress on your original goal. You were planning on making friends with Cassidy so you could get to know Shannon better, but you'd lost sight of that in the last few days. Not that you minded, you loved spending your days at the mall with your honorary sister, but you still had a major crush on Shannon. Then you realized the solution: you and Cassidy had become close friends by bonding over shopping and other girly activities. If Shannon were to join you two, she would grow close to you as well!

"I wish Shannon wants to come and have fun with Cassidy and I at the mall next time we go." you say aloud.

With that done, you put the coin away and go to sleep.

...

Shannon wasn't sure how she got here. She didn't usually go to the mall, but this didn't even look like the mall she remembered. Everything here looked so fun and energetic. Was the mall always this fun? Looking around, she saw her friend Cassidy and a boy she kind of recognized having fun and enjoying themselves everywhere she looked. And she could hear them calling out to her.

"Come join us Shannon! The mall is so much fun, you'll love it Shannon!"

It seemed like they might be right, and Shannon ran to join her friends in their fun.

...

It was dark, and everything was new and strange. Somehow, you knew this was your birth. Even though you were a newborn infant, you could hear and understand what was being said.

"It's a girl!" the nurse said.

"What's your daughter's name?" a doctor asked.

"Bernie." one of your parents said.

Bernie? That wasn't a girl's name, you couldn't be named Bernie. You listened a little closer to the response.

"Brittany. Our daughter Brittany."

Brittany, that was much better. A girly name for a girly girl. You looked over to the side of the room and saw your big sister Cassidy standing over there. She looked so happy to have a younger sister, and you could tell she was eager to teach you everything about being a girl. You couldn't wait to learn.

...

Shannon woke up later than usual, after a very nice night of sleep.

"I think I should go to the mall after school today. Maybe I'll call Cassidy and see if she wants to come."

...

You awoke with a start, as you alarm signaled it was time to get up. You looked around your room with dissatisfaction; it was too messy and really just too... boyish. You decided that your room needed a major overhaul to be suited for a girl like you.

Wait, girl? You must still be sleepy, thinking something like that. Still, you wouldn't mind being a girl. And your room still needed renovations, and a feminine style was exactly what you had in mind. Maybe you could buy some stuff for it when you went to the mall this afternoon.
1232121211111.title: Who Says Three's a Crowd?

12323.content: How about clothing likes and dislikes.
12323.title: Something Else

choices: You wanted to look more girly
123231.content:
That night Bernie had a dream that he was spending time with Cassidy, the both of you were in her room, she was dressed in a beautiful outfit, while you were naked... you felt embarrassed, not about being naked in front of her, but because her outfit was so much cuter than anything you had. Piece by piece Cassidy took off her clothes, though she never got naked somehow, and put them on you, you were delighted to wear her bra, and her panties, then her dress over them, you looked over and saw that the two of you matched and it made you very happy.

..........................................................

You woke that morning with a smile on your face. You could not remember any of the details but you did remember that you wanted to hang out with Cassidy again today and hopefully learn something useful about Shannon. It was about 10:30 in the morning as you got to Cassidy's house. When she opened the door, her face lit up.

"Hey Bernie!" She was already dressed, in a beautiful skirt and top.

"Hey Cass, I was wondering if you wanted to hang out today?" you asked

"Of Course! Actually I wanted to go shopping at the mall again."

"Shopping again already?" though something about the idea intrigued you.

"Of course, I wanted to try on some new clothes for the new season..."

"That actually sounds like fun" You did not know why but trying on clothes sounded legitimately interesting, and she could tell you were being honest.

"Yeah, you want to try some on too?" Her curiousity was peaked as well as ecstatic that you both wanted to go shopping.

"I mean, sure, I guess." You wondered why the idea of clothes shopping with Cassidy seemed so fun, but quickly put in the back of your brain.

"Awesome! Just let me get my purse. And then we'll go." Cassidy could tell it was going to be a fun day.

The drive was quick and navigating the mall to the store was quicker with Cassidy leading the way, as if she was laser targeted to the destination. You felt nervous going in and straight to the women's section with all the dresses and skirts, and girly tops

So you were playing with the coin in one hand as a form of stress relief. As Cassidy was looking at a rack of dresses you began to look around before a pair of cute dress caught your eye. it was flared, and greyish-purple with sequins. You showed it to Cassidy.

"Wow That is super cute, you have good taste. She goes to try it on.

For some reason, you feel an odd jealousy at that moment, and even more so when Cassidy shows it off.

"What do you think?"

http://s7d9.scene7.com/is/image/bebe/rbb...$Thumbnail4Across$

"You looks great!"

"You have good taste, do you want to try It on?" Cassidy was completely serious and ecstatic to see your taste and style.

"What? N-no, no I..." You were extremely embarrassed with your face turning the deepest shade of red.

Cassidy took you by the shoulders and faced with a dead serious face, "Bernie, I didn't ask you to make fun of you but, because I can tell that you were interested in it, more so than most guys would be, in my opinion I think You would look great in it. So do you want try it on."

You were touched by Cassidy's frankness and calmed down a little as you squeaked out a 'yes'. You'd never wanted to wear girl's clothes before, so why did you say Yes? But you couldn't deny She was right, you did want to wear it. Cassidy then proceeded change out of it, and hand it to you on a hangar. You were still pretty embarrassed but could deny the interest in the clothes.

"Would you like some help getting it on, it takes some finesse to get a some dresses on.

"Yes, if you would." You reply blushing

The two of you entered the changing room.

You sat down and put the coin down next to you without really thinking about it. You took off your shoes, then your pants and your shirt. You stood there in just your boxers blushing.

Cassidy helped you step into the dress, and zipped it up.

You deflated a bit when you saw you're reflection, You loved the dress but Cassidy looked better in it.

We'll need to get you some new underwear to really pull it off. Wait here." Cassidy said dashing out of the dressing room and returning minutets later.

"Here's a padded bra, some padded panties, and a waist cincher, with these you'll look better than me in that dress.

"You really think so?"

"I know it. Trust me"

Cassidy helps you out of the dress, has you change into the panties, puts the bra on you and wraps the waist cincher around, tightening it.

You try the dress on and are delighted, your dress hugs your created curves and you love how it looks.

You had never worn anything like this before but once you had it on a small smile came across your face looking at how cute you looked in this outfit, you felt a conflicting feeling of confusion, embarrassment and Joy from wearing them.

Meanwhile, Cassidy was sitting next to you, watching you primp in front of the mirror, She picked up the coin absentmindedly as she looked at how happy you were with your new outfit. She was so focused on this moment for you she had made another wish on you without even realizing it. The wish being...
123231.title: Clothing

1232312.content: You'd actually think you were a girl
1232312.title: Something else

choices: She gains an interest in video games and Sci Fi films
123232.content:
Does Cassidy gain some of some of your interest.
For instance your love of video games and Scifi films?
123232.title: No, something else

1232321.content:
[ I know the story had Bernie originally affected by the coin, but I wanted to take Cassidy wish a different way]

That Saturday night Cassidy kept rolling in her bed having a strange dream. In Cassidy's dream she was hanging out with Shannon and other friends at the mall, where they where all trying on clothes and talking about the latest episode of Keeping up with the Kardashians, but for some reason, all the clothes she tried on, felt prickly and irrating, and all the clothes that were there looked ugly. Also Shannon and the other girls kept talking about the Kardashians, but Cassidy hadn't seen the episode, soon enough Shannon and her other friends just excluded her from the conversation, and to be honest, the show was talked about in such a gross way that Cassidy became so fed up with the conversation that she didn't want to watch the show anymore.

Then out of the corner of her eye she spotted Bernie at the video game store, and he looked to be having fun playing a game in there. Being fed up, Cassidy told Shannon that she was not having fun and that Shannon should act more like the best friend she was, and make the trip more fun for all of them. Shannon, to Cassidy’s surprise, told her to walk away and that she was dragging the rest of the group down. She couldn’t believe her best friend did that, but she just left the store and looked for Bernies friendly face.

When she went into the Video game store, Bernie was there and welcomed her with open arms and a hug, which she needed right now. Then she asked what Bernie was doing there and he said that he was playing a demo of a video game coming out next month. He then asked her to play, to which Cassidy was hesitant. But the controller in her hands felt natural, so she tried it out while talking to Bernie. To Cassidy’s surprise, she found it really fun, there was a competitive side to her that she didn’t know she had and it started to come out. After the game Cassidy and Bernie walked to the food court together, and she just felt she could be so honest with him, and he was always warm and receptive. At the end of the conversation she asked Bernie a question, “hey do you think me and Shannon are still going to be best friends after this?” to which Bernie responded, “Hey sometimes people outgrow each other, and if your feeling that way with Shannon, that sucks, but remember I’m always here for you and you can always count on me” .To that Cassidy smiled and hugged Bernie, lucky she could find a friend like him.


Cassidy woke Sunday morning with a text from Shannon,

“Hey do you want to go shopping today with me, we can get that dress you wanted, otherwise I’m stuck at home for the day”
Cassidy thought about what she wanted to do, normally she’d love to go shopping with her friend, but now she wanted to see how Bernie would be as a shopping partner.
“Sorry, I’m just too busy today, but we’ll go to the mall some other time”

After that she texted Bernie, thinking about how crazy she was wanting to go shopping with him instead of Shannon.

“Hey can I come over then we can go to the mall, I want to see how good of shopping partners we are.”
to that Bernie responded with an “ok just come over anytime you want”.
After that Cassidy got dressed after a half an hour and walked next door and went up stairs to Bernies room, where Bernie greeted her, when she saw Bernie, something in the back of her mind told her to hug him, to which she gave in. She initiated the hug and the hug felt so warm and comforting that it was hard to let go. After which Bernie need to take a trip to the bathroom before he left, but left his online computer game running. When Bernie was in the bathroom, Cassidy watched the computer monitor, almost mesmerized by it with herself thinking, “wow that looks kinda fun, I bet I could be the best at that game”.

After Bernie came back to his room the two went to the mall, Where Cassidy had her eye on a cute outfit for awhile that she was finally going to buy. But when she got there, she tried on the dress and she felt itchy, which never happened before the previous time she that outfit on. Cassidy then searched around the mall for an outfit that would work, but she kept picking out mismatching outfits. Then Cassidy looked at shoes, and again she couldn’t find a pair she liked. What was more weird is that usually she was really into shopping, but now it seemed more like a hassle and a lot more boring than she thought.

During this time, Bernie just kept sitting down and played a really cool looking game on his phone, while Cassidy shopped. Cassidy really appreciated Bernie patience with her and glad he didn’t make her feel judgmental at all for taking up his time. To be honest, during shopping Cassidy wished she was the one playing the game (it looked really fun to her). After Cassidy was done looking, she decided not to buy anything (yet) for her fathers company event coming next Sunday.

After she was done she asked Bernie, if he wanted to go anywhere. Bernie then stated that he wanted to check out the video game store to see if they had any good deals on video games. On her way there Cassidy got more excited, she really wanted to see what Bernie was into, and when they got to the store Cassidy was not disappointed. Instead of Bernie just checking out the video games while Cassidy looked on, she actively participated in Bernies looking around. She asked Bernie what video games he had and what you do in them, and to be honest, all the video games sounded cool and interesting to her. So much so that to visitors of the store, it looked like Cassidy was big into video games and that Bernie was just a casual player. At the end of the search, Cassidy and Bernie played each other in a demo of a video game, and even though Cassidy lost, it was the most fun she had all day (the game was just full of excitement, every move she made was important, and the controller felt liked it belonged in her hand).

After that, she went back to Bernies and played all his video games, learning how to play them, and she had such a blast learning. (she was worried that Bernie would think she’s weird, but Bernie had been so friendly and kind that she could trust him with being herself). She had such a blast that the annoying texts about fashion she got from her friends she just left ignored, it was so out of character for that Shannon ended up calling for her to make sure she was alright.

That night Cassidy tried to watch Keeping up with the Kardashians, (She was the biggest fan of the show out of all of her friends) but she found the show so annoying that she texted Bernie what he was watching which he replied Aliens, and when she turned it on she was hooked and texted Bernie through the whole movie, loving it.

That night Cassidy went to bed happy, thinking of all the fun her and Bernie had. Bernie, meanwhile went to bed looking at the Dream Coin, curious as to how it worked. He was glad he was now becoming best friends with Cassidy, but confused on how it worked (I mean why would Cassidy now hate fashion, and love video games, did the coin change her personality so that they could become best friends? there was just so many questions now). Bernie decided he would wait a week before touching the coin again to see the effects of the coin for a week.
1232321.title: She gains an interest in video games and Sci Fi...

12323211.content:
Week later
The week that passed was a weird one for Cassidy, every night she kept having weird dreams. Like one dream was that she was sent to an all girl boarding school with a mean teacher, who stressed that girls should focus on doing girl things like shopping or fashion, and just do what other girls do. Another one was Cassidy in the future becoming a professional gamer, while Shannon texted her how great it being a stay at home housewife with a boring life (Cassidy couldn't imagine anyone having fun in that kind of life). But the Dreams all ended the same, with Bernie being right by her side, always helping her out (her loudest fan as she won a gaming championship, or helping her escape from that awful school) and trying to make her happy.

Cassidy non Dream week.

On Monday in Science, after listening to her other friends talk about Chloe Kardashin, (which now sounded like nails on a chalk board), She told the group she was going to be Bernie’s partner, in order to save face (in front of her group which consisted of the cheerleaders) she said that she might have a crush on him and she was going to find out whether he was a keeper.

After that speech, she spent with less and less with her Cheer crowed and more and more with Bernie. For instance, Cassidy usually was at a cheer leaders house after cheer practice 4 out of 5 days on school days, but this week she only spent one day with the Cheer crowed and that was on Wednesday their annual mall day where the girls just looked at clothes together and had fun. But on that Wednesday Cassidy was determined to get something to wear for her dad’s big company event on Sunday, but when it came to shopping Cassidy was just so bored and unmotivated that she texted Bernie what to do (He told her that if she didn’t like anything don’t buy anything and they could go this weekend). What was worse was that she was the fashion expert in her group, so when the other girls came to her, she had to act happy and try to help them out, even though she lost her fashion touch.

School wise, Monday, Tuesday Wednesday Cassidy ate lunch with her cheer friends, but just found that her interest didn’t align with the cheer group, so now Cassidy felt left out. So on Thursday and Friday, she ate with Bernie (using the double excuse of being project partners, and potential romantic leads).

After School wise Cassidy still went to cheer practice, but during that time she thought about video games and Sci-Fi films and couldn’t wait to see Bernie, and after cheer practice she would go see Bernie at his house and just have fun by talking video games and movies with him. During the weeknights (except Wednesday) Cassidy played video games and got progressively better. When she was playing, Bernie would ask her questions about how her life was and how she was feeling, and if there was any gossip amongst the cheer leaders. Cassidy just felt great that she had someone to talk to about this, and she was really happy that Bernie took interest in her life. As the week went on Cassidy tried to find extra time to spend with Bernie (she thought about quitting the cheer team), she ultimately decided to save time to not changing in the school shower and wearing her cheer uniform to Bernies (which happened on Thursday and Friday)
. At the end of the week, Cassidy began thinking of shifting her group of friends to Bernie, cause when she was with him, she was happy.


Bernie’s week
Bernie’s week was weird, First Cassidy became his science partner (which he liked), but then Cassidy went full on best friends with him by texting and snapchats him (Cassidy loved it when he replied). Also of note was Cassidy’s wanting to spend more time with him, texting Bernie that the cheer girls bore her with all the fashion and reality tv talk, that she just needed to relax with a friend. Cassidy spent 4 out 5 nights with Bernie (Bernie convinced her to go to the mall with her friends and by the text message she sent back to Bernie, he could tell she was not having a good time). During those night Cassidy would play video games with him or watch movies, and each night she would come over she became a little bit better at video games, and a little bit more interested in Sci-Fi, while complaining more and more about Fashion shopping (which Bernie never thought he would hear coming out of her mouth).

During that time, Bernie did some psychological tests on her. He made her reveal all the gossip going on in the cheer team, had her reveal all of Shannon’s secrets she held. Bernie also made her reveal all of Cassidy’s darkest secrets. On Wednesday night Bernie really tested their friendship, after the mall trip, Bernie meet Cassidy for 5 minutes (before her curfew ended) and he planted the seed that they should see each other as much as possible over the next two days. The trial turned out to be a success when Cassidy thought about quitting the cheer team to spend more with Bernie (Bernie didn’t want her to quit, because he was going after Shannon) which resulted in eating lunch together and Cassidy wearing her cheer uniform to Bernies to save time.
On Thursday night Bernie pushed the limit even further, first he talked to her the Hola hopping was fun and had her do it in his room, next Bernie brought up the possibility of Cassidy having lumps, and he removed her top and felt her up. Even playing with her breast a little bit of wiggling it together and making a sound.

The result of this experiment was that no matter what Bernie did, Cassidy was going to view it in the most positive light and reaffirm her friendship with him (after gossip she was glad Bernie took interest in her life, sharing secrets were now fun bonding moments between them, Hola hopping in a room was so ridiculous it was funny, and Bernie playing with her boobs really eased the mood of a scary situation). But Bernie was still really curious why she loved video games and Sci-Fi so much (that part didn’t seem necessary for them to be best friends after what Bernie pulled.

On Friday, Bernie got that answer. While Bernie was working on the science project, Cassidy was playing video games. A real bummer about being Cassidy’s lab partner is that she’s quite the airhead and horrible at science. After a while working on a project you noticed that Cassidy beat a hard level on a video game, to which she sighed with satisfaction. “Wow, I didn’t see you beating that level, nice”
“I know, it was like really hard, by the way Burns (Bernie’s new pet name), what are you doing?”.
“Oh I’m just doing the project, on how hormones effect the human brain”
“Oh you know what, that probably happened to me on Sunday, I wanted to be Best Friends with you but this video game stuff seemed so boring so I made a wish that we could share more interest and boom, Hormones take action I’m playing video games.”
At that point 15 alarm bells went off in Bernie’s head, but he played it cool and did?
12323211.title: See how the week went

123232111.content:
At that point, Bernie knew how the dream coin worked and it made sense why she developed interest similar to his. Since he knew how the coin worked now (and knew to be more careful with it), he wasn’t afraid to take the next steps to test the coins power, but in order for his plan to work Bernie had to set it up right there and then. Cassidy wanted to help on the project, but she knew she wasn’t good at science stuff, so he that to his advantage.

“Hey Cassidy, you ready to go shopping tomorrow?”
“Ugh, no, that seems so boring, I’d rather be here playing video games”.
“Aww come on Cassidy, all those years of shopping had to fill up great fashion advice”.
“Yeah well it’s stupid cause I don’t even like to shop”.
“Hey curious question, if you could be the smartest student in the state, but you suffered from Fashion blindness would you take the deal”
Cassidy took a long pause, “Can someone dress me and be my fashion advisor?”
“Since I’m your best friend I get to be the one who dress you, and to sweeten the deal I’ll have the best fashion sense in the state and you enjoy it when I dress you and shop with you”
“You’ve won me over with the shopping with you part”.
Bernie looked back at his paper (acting) and said “Right now I wish that wish came true to help with this project”
Cassidy, distracted by her video game said “Yeah I wished that too”.

With the seeds planted, Bernie took it easy for the rest of the night. and once Cassidy left Bernie set his plan into motion and took out the dream coin out of the lock.

First he made sure that Cassidy felt responsible for her personality changes, making her believe she ran into a genie last weekend that would grant her 3 wishes, but she wouldn’t know a genie contacted her until after she made all 3 wishes (Bernie also wished that she wouldn’t suspect Bernie of being behind this).
Bernie made the 3 wishes be
(either that she wanted Bernie to be her best friend or the perfect boyfriend (she wouldn’t know which))
(wish she and Bernie had similar interest)
(For her to become smart, but permanently fashion blind).

Next Bernie added that Cassidy could get angry at him(instead of the creepy always best case scenario to whatever he takes), but after 5 hours makes it easier to forgive each other. Also he made sure that she couldn’t get mad at him until after that night.

Next he made sure that Cassidy would hate her role of dumb blonde, (including cheer leader part) but feel forced to fit into that role so no one feels suspicious of her. Bernie also made it that without him around she would slip her cover more easily. As the last condition, Bernie made sure Cassidy felt compelled to make sure Bernie and her were boyfriend and girlfriend, not for romantic reasons, but to make sure she didn’t blow her cover.

For the people around Bernie, He made sure his family didn’t find it odd that he was able to date Cassidy, next he made sure Cassidy’s parents would be comfortable with him being alone in Cassidy bedroom and them chill dating their daughter. Next Bernie (after much debate) made a wish that Shannon of not only to be suspicious of Cassidy, but also jealous that Cassidy gets to date him.

(Also obviously Bernie wished himself fashion smart with the coin and Cassidy a genius and the smartest student in the state).

When Bernie fell asleep he dreamed he was a fashion expert on a reality tv show, and throughout the show Bernie judged all kind of dresses and outfits, and noticed things down to the finer things that could make or break an outfit. At the end of the show he felt that he significantly helped fashion designer make beautiful outfits.

When Cassidy fell asleep, She dreamt she was on stage being judged against other smart people, she thought she was going to embarrass herself up there, but when the judges asked questions, she found them so simple, even algebra was just math, and biology was simple, it was just easy memorization which she had. She remembered winning with Bernie right there in the crowd supporting her. Due to the win she next went on a game show, where she went on a game show and she spun a big wheel with the name of clothing items on it, and if she landed on a name she had to quickly get dressed in the item, she found the randomness so fun, she didn’t even care what she put on. Finally, at the end of the game show, the host turned into a Genie stated that her three wishes were up, and no he was gone from her life, and deep down Cassidy recognized the Genie and realized what the Genie was saying was true. With that the Genie puffed into smoke and Cassidy woke up in her bed.

Bernie woke up to the sound of his phone going off, with the call coming from Cassidy. Bernie picked up and heard Cassidy “Hey umm, Bernie, please don’t get made, can you just come over, Umm I need to see you as soon as possible, while my parents are still out”. While on the phone, Bernie realized that the coin did it’s job, as he started to appreciate clothes in his dresser in ways he never did before.
When Bernie walked next door he received a text to just enter Cassidy’s room. When he did it was a slight to behold. There was Cassidy in a corset, a dress, then a tee shit overtop with her wearing sweatpants that said “Juicy” on the butt, while wearing socks and crocs with her hair flipped over to one side of her head.
“Hey can I talk to you”

Cassidy woke up with a clear mind, and felt great for the first time in awhile. She went to her backpack and started doing her math homework, which she found so easy that homework that would usually take 30 minutes and left her confused. After she was done her parents told her that she was going to the market and was wondering if she would like to come. She said sure and she just had to get dressed. After that she looked at her closet and absolute confusion came over her. Then she started thinking how she should look in public, she wanted to look nice, so a croissant and a dress were classy, but she also wanted to look relaxed so sweatpants it was, Then she wanted to look a bit rebellious so she moved her hair over to one side. Then she just wanted comfort so she took out the crocs in the back of her closet and put them on with socks. It was at that moment Cassidy remembered her dream, and realized what happened. She remembered the dream and a pit started to form in her stomach realizing the what happened. Cassidy then looked on youtube for fashion tips, but the tips just went in and out. She just couldn’t realize what she was doing wrong. After that, she told her parents she wasn’t feeling well and called Bernie to help out.

When Bernie was there he asked what she was wearing to which she said she was trying to get dressed for the market, but failed spectacularly. At that moment Bernie asked her why she didn’t just wear black leggings, and nice white teeshirt and and good sweeter with her washed hair just flowing down to give her a cute, but nice look. To that Bernie acted dumb and asked “Hey how did I know that?” to that Bernie and Cassidy headed to the mall, on the way Cassidy explained the genie in her dream and how she thinks sub courteously the genie was granting her wishes and the dreams were a manifesto of those dreams. Bernie also lied and said he had weird dreams of him and Cassidy, becoming good friends. At the mall Bernie wanted to see how far the dream came true, so he left Cassidy at the mall and she shopped for 30 minutes, and she absolutely hated it, then after the 30 minutes Bernie joined in and Bernie knew the in’s and out’s of the fashion scene so for Cassidy’s dinner the next day, Bernie picked out an outfit for her father’s company meeting. During the checkout the casher was totaling up the on the outfit order and Cassidy also was doing the math in her head, and before the total was rang Cassidy out loud said the total price plus tax before the machine was done. Which she was proud of.

On the way back, Bernie talked to her about her new brains. He told her not to show off her brain too much as her raise in IQ would be suspicious, and that she had to act dumb in order not to raise suspicion to which she reluctantly agreed to.

What did Bernie and Cassidy do next?
123232111.title: make her the polar opposite of who she is

15.content: You decided that you weren't in a rush and could use it whenever you wanted. You put it on top of the dresser and left, intending to use it later. While you were gone someone went into your room and found the coin.
15.title: You put it on your dresser, there is no need to...

info.brief_description: You find an old Asian coin that allows you to make dreams that affect people.
info.description:
You find a coin that can allow you to make other people act a certain way by creating dreams but, someone might use it on you whether they are aware or not or you might accidentally use it on yourself.

Try to make some really vivid dreams to go along with their affects with a person .

Here is how the magic item works:
0. The Dream only starts when they are asleep, obviously.
1. Only people touching the coin can make a wish.
2. People can not be given two separate wishes at once. (Wish-->Dream-->New wish)
3. The dream does NOT make major affects after one dream. The effects are small and bigger effects must be caused by making the same wish again the next day. Physical changes are also really small and don't start happening until after a large amount of the same type of dream has occurred for that person.
4. The dreams do not wear off or get stronger unless another dream has been sent to that person.
5. The Coin targets whoever you specify but, it interprets your request anyway it wants and makes a dream to reflect your desires.
6. People don't have to literally become what they are in their dreams, it is just a visual representation of the user's request.
7. Since people only remember a small portion of their dreams, they don't necessarily have to remember the dream that is affecting them.

Cast:
Bernie 16 years old (You): A high school sophomore with a B average grades, short brown hair, 5'7'' and pretty slim and likes video games and SciFi.

Joyce 39 years old (your Mom): A housewife who tries her best to keep you and your two siblings happy and is trying to get you to be more responsible.

Michele 18 years old (Your older Sister): She is all about fashion and makeup and enjoys teasing you and your best friend by trying to test her makeup on you, she favors your little sister because of their shared girlishness.

Danna 10 years old (your younger Sister): She is your stereotypical little girly sister who always looks for an excuse to show off and rope people into playing with her.

Ian 9 years old (your Brother): He is a surprisingly mellow kid who likes to avoid conflict and do his own thing.

Dylan 38 years old (your Father): He is busy most of the time with work but, enjoys talking to his kids and wife when he is free.

Drake 16 years old (Your Best Friend): He likes to play pranks on people but, when he goes too far, he tries what ever it takes to make it up to them.

Shannon 17 years old (Your Crush): Smart, Pretty, and on the Cheerleader team. She is a kind person who is easy to talk to and enjoys helping others.

Cassidy 16 years old (Shannon's Best Friend): A blonde, ditsy airhead she is kind and pretty but not to bright and is extremely girly and is on the Cheerleader team with Shannon. You have been neighbors for years but, your interests have never aligned so your just acquaintances.

Ryan 17 years old (Bully): He is an asshole who is pretty antagonistic towards you for no reason other than he is just an asshole.

Mr. Peters 23 years old (English Teacher): He acts smug and grades harshly despite his age and appearance. He loves having authority over his students and enjoys chastising them.

Ms. Monroe 29 years old (Math Teacher): Beloved by all of her students, she is known for having easy to understand lessons without going easy on them and tries to offer as much free time to help struggling students.

Given enough time, anything can happen. Have Fun!
